channel.title: Notes on Walden
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Walden

item.title: Hugo Theme Walden
item.author: author@domain.com (Author Name)
item.description: After reading Walden, a collection of essays by American writer Henry David Thoreau, I was deeply influenced by his love of nature and simple living. So, I wrote this concise and clear theme for my personal website and named it Walden.

item.title: Markdown Examples for Hugo Theme Walden
item.author: author@domain.com (Author Name)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
